IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: GATEWAY-LONGVIEW, INC. IS A NOT-FOR-PROFIT HUMAN SERVICE ORGANIZATION WHOSE MISSION IS TO PROVIDE HIGH QUALITY SUPPORTIVE, EDUCATIONAL, HOUSING AND SUBSTITUTE CARE SERVICES FOR CHILDREN/YOUTH AND FAMILIES WHEN THOSE CHILDREN/YOUTH HAVE EMOTIONAL OR BEHAVIORAL PROBLEMS AND ARE IN NEED OF, OR REQUIRE OUT-OF-HOME PLACEMENT. SERVICES ARE PROVIDED PRIMARILY IN WESTERN NEW YORK.
IRS990.MissionDescription: PROVIDE HIGH QUALITY SUPPORTIVE, EDUCATIONAL, PREVENTIVE, THERAPEUTIC CARE SERVICES FOR CHILDREN/YOUTH AND FAMILIES WHEN THOSE YOUTH HAVE EMOTIONAL AND BEHAVIORAL CHALLENGES, EDUCATIONAL AND/OR PHYSCHOLOGICAL NEEDS.
IRS990.Description: EDUCATIONAL SERVICES- Gateway-Longview's Educational Services programs are designed to provide highly focused special education to preschool, elementary, middle and high school students in need of individualized scholastic assistance. Gateway-Longview's Educational Services include Niagara Day Care Center, Therapeutic Preschool, and our Day School/Treatment Program.

Activity2.Description: RESIDENTIAL SERVICES- Gateway-Longview's Residential Services programs are designed to strengthen families, provide guidance and support for teens and young adults, and improve the lives of the children we serve that need 24-hour-a-day support, counseling, and care. Gateway-Longview's Residential Services include Residential Treatment, Changing Attitudes and Behaviors (C.A.B.), Residential Education, Recreation Department, Spiritual Life Development, Casey Life Skills Training, Independent Living Programs, Parent/Child Independent Living Programs, and our Independent Living Training Center.

Activity3.Description: COMMUNITY SERVICES- Gateway-Longview's Community Services programs are designed to strengthen and stabilize families. Gateway-Longview's Community Services include Foster Care & Adoption Services, Therapeutic Foster Care, Foster Care Parents, Respite Services, Care Coordination & Community Support, Therapeutic Facilitated Visitation, Kinship Services, and our Family Resource Center.

Form990ScheduleLPartIV.DescriptionOfTransaction: board member's corporation provides construction services for the organization. all transactions are at arms length (competive bids).
board member's corporation provides it consulting services for the organization. fees for services are based on competitive market rates.
board member's corporation provides construction services for the organization. all transactions are at arms length (competive bids).

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The 990 is presented in draft form to the Board of Directors for their review and approval prior to filing with the Internal Revenue Service.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: in accordance with the organizations conflict of interest policy, each officer and member of the board of directors shall annually complete a form that affirms that such person: a.has received a copy of the conflict of interst policy b. has read and understands the policy c. has agreed to comply with the policy and d. understands that in order to maintain its federal exemption, it must engage primarily in activities which accomplish its exempt purpose.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: the ceo has a three year employment contract with the organization that is approved by the board of directors. each year, the ceo and the board mutually agree upon a set of goals for the year. the board meets with the ceo to review and evaluate his performance for the year.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The governing documents and financial statements of Gateway-Longview, Inc. are made available to the public by visiting Gateway-Longview's office at 605 Niagara Street, Buffalo, NY 14201 during regular business hours. Copies can be provided upon request over the phone, in writing and via email.
THE ORGANIZATION HAS NOT CHANGED ITS OVERSIGHT PROCESS OR SELECTION PROCESS DURING THE TAX YEAR.

Form990ScheduleRPartII.PrimaryActivities: TO SUPPORT THE EXEMPT PURPOSE OF GATEWAY-LONGVIEW, INC.
TO PROVIDE CARE COORDINATION SERVICES TO THE COMMUNITY.
